title: Is ZEE5 free for Jio users? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are a JioFiber user you can avail complimentary subscription to Zee5. JioFiber offers a complimentary subscription to other popular OTT apps as well. This list includes premium apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+Hotstar app, etc. Read below to know more about these broadband plans - Gold - This plan costs Rs 999 monthly and offers 150Mbps speedDiamond - This plan costs Rs 1499 monthly and offers 300Mbps speedDiamond+ - This plan costs Rs 2499 monthly and offers 500Mbps speedPlatinum - This plan costs Rs 3999 monthly and offers 1Gbps speedTitanium - This plan costs Rs 8499 monthly and offers 1Gbps speedTo get these plans you can visit Jio.com or download the MyJio app.
yes but only for jio fiber users
